cells.data:
Regions:
Ampicillin: http://bitesizebio.com/10188/whats-the-problem-with-ampicillin-selection/
Ampicillin is commonly used as a selection marker for plasmids in gene cloning and protein expression in E.coli and other bacteria. 

Neutral sequence shot be EvePmt: Blasted and got results that are not on chr2R.  What is EvePmt? Is this just left over from the cloning process to include enzyme digestion sites? I talked with Augusto and he seemed to agree with me that the neutral region an be removed quite easily. 


EvePromoter: Overlapping the start of eve.


Eve5UTR: Region within the coding region.  


Construct information


pbPHi backbone vector

- Venken KJT, He Y, Hoskins RA, Bellen HJ (2006) P[acman]: A BAC transgenic platform for targeted insertion of large DNA fragments in D. melanogaster. Science 314(5806): 1747–1751.

- Perry MW, Boettiger AN, Bothma JP, Levine M (2010) Shadow enhancers foster robustness of Drosophila gastrulation. Curt Biol 20(17):1562–1567.
